data_table.description: Medications Reported at Clinic Exam (ATC coded), New Offspring Spouse and Omni 2, Exam 1. Medications were reported by study participants, coded with WHO ATC medication codes.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier (counts are observations, not participants)

variable.name: medname
variable.description: Medication name (character variable)
variable.comment: 1. "NO MEDS LISTED" = there were no medications listed on the form. However, it may not necessarily imply that the participant is not taking any medications. ATC_COD1 = "NO_MEDS". 2. The same drug may be recorded in more than one record for an individual participant. This is because the participant took the medication at more than one strength and/or dose. 3. The text written on the form was preserved "as is". There could be some misspellings, etc.
variable.value: There were medications listed on the form
There were no medications listed on the form

variable.name: medstren
variable.description: Medication strength (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = Unknown Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: mednum
variable.description: Number taken for given period (MEDPER)
variable.comment: This variable should be used in conjunction with MEDPER.

variable.name: medper
variable.description: Period range medication taken
variable.comment: This variable should be used in conjunction with MEDNUM.

variable.name: medprn
variable.description: Medication taken as needed?

variable.name: medbag
variable.description: Medication bag with medications brought to exam or med bottles/pack used by examiner to complete the form?
variable.comment: 1. If MEDNAME = "NO MEDS LISTED" then MEDBAG set to 0=NO. 2. MEDBAG =0 means that participants did not bring medications to the exam. Medications can still be reported by the participant.

variable.name: atc_cod1
variable.description: ATC code for medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: 1. This dataset includes ALL New Offspring Spouse and OMNI Group 2 participants who attended Exam 1. If participant did not list any medications, MEDNAME was set to "NO MEDS LISTED" and ATC_COD1 set to "NO_MEDS". 2. Some medications were coded as "NO_CODE", which means that either there is no code for it (for example supplements, herbal preparations, homeopathic remedies, etc.) or the medication's name did not have enough information for coding. ATC_COD1 modified - medications classified for the treatment of addiction, HIV infection and psychosis have been removed to preserve confidentiality.
variable.value: There were medications listed on the form

variable.name: atc_cod2
variable.description: ATC code for second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: ATC_COD2 modified - medications classified for the treatment of addiction, HIV infection and psychosis have been removed to preserve confidentiality. Blank = No meds, not coded or single drug. Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: atc_cod3
variable.description: ATC code for third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: ATC_COD3 modified - medications classified for the treatment of addiction, HIV infection and psychosis have been removed to preserve confidentiality. Blank = No meds, not coded or no third compound. Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: atc_cod4
variable.description: ATC code for fourth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: ATC_COD4 modified - medications classified for the treatment of addiction, HIV infection and psychosis have been removed to preserve confidentiality. Blank = No meds, not coded or no fourth compound. Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: system1
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds or not coded Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: system2
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or single drug Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: system3
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no third compound Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: system4
variable.description: Description/label for anatomical main group - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: Blank = No meds, not coded or no fourth compound Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: ther_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: ther_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: ther_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: ther_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for therapeutic subgroup - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have therapeutic subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: phrm_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: phrm_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: phrm_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: phrm_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for pharmacological subgroup - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have pharmacological subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_gp1
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_gp2
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_gp3
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_gp4
variable.description: Description/label for chemical subgroup - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have chemical subgroup specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_nm1
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - medication or first drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or first drug does not have chemical substance specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_nm2
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - second drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or second drug does not have chemical substance specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_nm3
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - third drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or third drug does not have chemical substance specified Not blank = Filled in.

variable.name: chem_nm4
variable.description: Description/label for chemical substance - forth drug in compound (character variable)
variable.comment: blank = No meds, not coded or fourth drug does not have chemical substance specified Not blank = Filled in.
